title: karuNai kATTi ennai
sahitya:
karuNai kATTi ennai kaDaittETra murugA irakkam unakku enru pirakkumO siridu


anupallavi

  porumai izhakkAdu eduvarai poruppEn en varuttam anaittum uraippEnadu kETTu


caraNam    tunbak-kaDaliDaiyE tuDikkavennait-taLLum tollaigaLukkum Or ellaiyum illaiyE
anbuk-kaDal pOl aLavillA aruLODu ten pazhani tigazhum deiva shikhAmaNiyE
